prompts: Create a cute, small Pokemon that resembles a blue rabbit with red spots.
I want a friendly Pokemon with large ears and a playful personality.
Generate a small creature with a round body and sharp spikes on its back.
Make a forest-dwelling Pokemon that can easily camouflage in grass.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves into a powerful creature, starting as a tiny one.
Design a Pokemon that thrives in mountainous habitats and has a vibrant color palette.
Give me a Pokemon that has a unique dual-type and a charismatic demeanor.
